parameters.name: AppId
parameters.description:
The ID of the application.

>  The ID can be up to 64 characters in length and can contain letters, digits, underscores (\_), and hyphens (-).

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 100.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ format.
